description:

messages.text:
*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=e641a237b2ad ***

net/url: fix URL Opaque notes on making client requests

Fixes issue 4860

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7375047

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

actually, not lgtm.
doesn't the client still have to give a Host and Scheme so that the Get
knows what to dial?



On Thu, Feb 21, 2013 at 4:15 PM, Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org> wrote:

> LGTM
>
> Drop the &s.
>
>

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, rsc@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

oh, duh, yes. PTAL.

On Thu, Feb 21, 2013 at 1:16 PM, Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org> wrote:

> actually, not lgtm.
> doesn't the client still have to give a Host and Scheme so that the Get
> knows what to dial?
>
>
